name: Sycho Squirrel
description: I'm adding this one to my account just for fun. This is the first 2D platformer I created using Unity (a long past version). I think the game and the world of Sycho the squirrel are fun and worth checking out though there might be some technical issues (if you are viewing the game at a small resolution, the UI might not fit in the screen). Unless there is a high demand, I probably won't make updates to this version. That being said, I may revisit the Sycho universe in an upcoming game title. Enjoy!
